segments.text: Hi , what brings you to my office today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve been getting really short of breath , and my coach wanted to have a doctor check me out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you had the flu lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I have been pretty healthy . I just have trouble taking a really deep breath .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you ever been tested for allergies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Peaches make me break out , but I don ’ t have any other allergies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does this happen all the time or maybe a little more in the cold weather ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve noticed that it is worse when I am under stress , like during finals week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I feel that you should see a pulmonary specialist to check for asthma .
segments.speaker: S1
